author: Special Correspondent
text:
The long pending demand of the travelling public will become a reality with the laying of foundation stone for the new broad-gauge line between Kallakurichi and Chinna Salem on February 7.

Suresh Prabhakar Prabhu, Minister for Railways, will lay the foundation stone through video conferencing from Chennai. The project was originally sanctioned in 2006. The updated estimated cost for the new BG line is Rs.116.61 crore and the State Government has deposited a sum of Rs. 64 crore towards its cost sharing at 50:50 formula.

The total length of the new BG line will be 16.20 km with 2 major and 22 minor bridges
title: Minister to lay stone for new BG line
